subject: Re: Files access on yahoo groups
msgSnippet: ... the yahoo groups ... don t have a ... I changed it to members a couple of days ago since someone was having problems uploading.  I ve changed it back to
messageBody:
--- In junit@y..., Shez <shez@t...> wrote:
> Hi there,
> Just wondering if its intentional that the files section of
the yahoo groups
> is not available to guests? Its a wee bit inconvenient if you
don't have a
> yahoo ID.
> Cheers
> Shez

I changed it to members a couple of days ago since someone was having
problems uploading. I've changed it back to public.

Erik Meade
http://junit.org
emeade@...
